answers.answer: You should call and see what they think. It may be nothing, but it's safer to find out for sure. Calling would be an in between option.
You need to be seen if you think it's preeclampisa. Your baby's health is number 1. High salt diet would cause swelling too.

Find a way to check your blood pressure.  Like at a grocery store...sit at the thing for like four minutes before doing it. If it is above like 160/100 then u need to go in otherwise those are some symptoms that go along with your already diagnosed preeclampsia

Go straight to the er dont hang around and wait..preclapsia can be life threatening so i wouldnt take any chances with this..the risks are just too high with preclapsia,you need to get checked by a doctor..best of luck i hope all will be ok

Just want to add that I am a nurse...and only of your blood pressure is at or above 160/100 ish will they keep you. Otherwise they will send you home on a modified type bed rest. You should call your doctor though.

Be watchful. My bp jumped right up to 240/180 in a matter of hours when I had preeclampsia the first time. Luckily I had access to monitors because I work in er. I literally nearly died. Please don't ignore this.

My former boss lost her best friend because of this. She swelled so bad they had to take the baby at 27 weeks and there was no hope for her because it had gotten so bad. Baby was in the hospital for a long time but he lived.
I wasn't diagnosed with preeclampsia and I have the same symptoms. 140 over 70 is not that bad. And swelling in the hands is normal.
Thanks everyone. I went. Taking another urine test and i see the doctor wed

question: This is my first pregnancy, I'm a plus size woman who was diagnosed with preeclampsia. My pressure is 140/70 which is slightly elevated but since my appointment on Wed, my hands have become swollen and i have a slight headache. I don't have the best medical insurance simply because I can't afford it right now and so i am hesitant to go to triaoge but I don't want anything to happen to either one of us. I'm praying and crying because I'm in a tough spot. What do I do? Should i go or no?
title: 32 Weeks and Preeclampsia...
